item.description:
It is time for Dim Sum again!

Join us at China Pearl Quincy 12pm this coming Sunday - 1/15. Afterwards we will head out to the Shea Memorial Rink in Quincy (651 Willard St) to skate off some calories. Admission is free and skates can be rented for a nominal fee.

This RSVP is for both lunch and skating. Please indicate in your RSVP if you plan to attend lunch or skating only.

Transportation - if you need a ride please indicate which town and/or T stop you are located. Some of us will be able to pick up from the Quincy Center T station.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum & Ice-Skating
